root.name: James Cameron's Dark Angel
root.description: OverviewJames Cameron’s Dark Angel the video game is based on the TV series Dark Angel, developed by Radical Entertainment and published by Sierra. Dark Angel was released 2002 in North America. The game had lack of good production due to the Dark Angel TV series being canceled during development.GameplayFrom the start you are placed in a simple tutorial stage, from there on you are placed into a level, within the next three to four levels the game tries to input a stealth mechanic that doesn’t work as intended. The game mechanics are simple enough with most combos revolving around a three button combination.
